app.component.html:
<style>
    .diagram-annotations .image-pattern-style {
        background-color: white;
        background-size: contain;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        height: 50px;
        width: calc((100% - 18px) / 3);
        cursor: pointer;
        border: 1px solid #D5D5D5;
        background-position: center;
        float: left;
    }
    
    .diagram-annotations .image-pattern-style:hover {
        border-color: gray;
        border-width: 2px;
    }
    
    .diagram-annotations .e-remove-selection .property-section-content {
        pointer-events: none;
    }
    
    .diagram-annotations .column-style {
        display: table;
        height: 35px;
        padding-right: 4px;
        padding-left: 0px;
        width: calc((100% - 12px) / 3);
    }
    
    .diagram-annotations .row {
        margin-left: 0px;
        margin-right: 0px;
    }
    
    .diagram-annotations .row-header {
        font-size: 13px;
        font-weight: 500;
    }
    
    .diagram-annotations .e-checkbox-wrapper .e-label {
        font-size: 12px;
    }
    
    .diagram-annotations .e-selected-style {
        border-color: #006CE6;
        border-width: 2px;
    }
    
    .diagram-annotations .col-xs-6 {
        padding-left: 0px;
        padding-right: 0px;
        padding-top: 5px;
    }
    
    .diagram-annotations .property-section .e-remove-selection {
        cursor: not-allowed;
    }
    
    @font-face {
        font-family: 'e-ddb-icons';
        src: url(data:application/x-font-ttf;charset=utf-8;base64,) format('truetype');
        font-weight: normal;
        font-style: normal;
    }
    
    .e-ddb-icons {
        font-family: 'e-ddb-icons';
        speak: none;
        font-size: 55px;
        font-style: normal;
        font-weight: normal;
        font-variant: normal;
        text-transform: none;
        line-height: 1;
        -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
        -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
    }
    
    .diagram-annotations .e-bold::before {
        content: "\e712";
    }
    
    .diagram-annotations .e-italic::before {
        content: "\e717";
    }
    
    .diagram-annotations .e-underline::before {
        content: "\e716";
    }
    
    .diagram-annotations .material .e-bold::before {
        content: "\e707";
    }
    
    .diagram-annotations .material .e-italic::before {
        content: "\e70b";
    }
    
    .diagram-annotations .material .e-underline::before {
        content: "\e702";
    }
    
    .diagram-annotations .bootstrap .e-bold::before {
        content: "\e71f";
    }
    
    .diagram-annotations .bootstrap .e-italic::before {
        content: "\e723";
    }
    
    .diagram-annotations .bootstrap .e-underline::before {
        content: "\e71a";
    }
    
    .diagram-annotations .e-btn {
        box-shadow: 0 3px 1px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0), 0 2px 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0), 0 1px 5px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
    }
    
    .diagram-annotations .e-bigger .e-btn.e-small.e-icon-btn {
        padding: 0px;
    }
    
    .diagram-annotations .sb-child-row {
        padding-top: 8px;
    }
</style>


<div class="control-section diagram-annotations">
    <div class="col-lg-8">
        <ejs-diagram #diagram id="diagram" width="100%" height="645px" [getConnectorDefaults]='connDefaults' [getNodeDefaults]='nodeDefaults' (selectionChange)="selectionChange($event)" (created)="diagramCreate($event)" [snapSettings]='snapSettings'>
            <e-nodes>
                <e-node id='industry' [height]=60 [width]=150 [offsetX]=400 [offsetY]=250>
                    <e-node-annotations>
                        <e-node-annotation content='Industry Competitors'>
                        </e-node-annotation>
                    </e-node-annotations>
                </e-node>
                <e-node id='potential' [height]=60 [width]=150 [offsetX]=400 [offsetY]=110>
                    <e-node-annotations>
                        <e-node-annotation content='Potential Entrants'>
                        </e-node-annotation>
                    </e-node-annotations>
                </e-node>
                <e-node id='supplier' [height]=60 [width]=150 [offsetX]=200 [offsetY]=250>
                    <e-node-annotations>
                        <e-node-annotation content='Suppliers'>
                        </e-node-annotation>
                    </e-node-annotations>
                </e-node>
                <e-node id='substitutes' [height]=60 [width]=150 [offsetX]=400 [offsetY]=390>
                    <e-node-annotations>
                        <e-node-annotation content='Substitutes'>
                        </e-node-annotation>
                    </e-node-annotations>
                </e-node>
                <e-node id='buyers' [height]=60 [width]=150 [offsetX]=600 [offsetY]=250>
                    <e-node-annotations>
                        <e-node-annotation content='Buyers'>
                        </e-node-annotation>
                    </e-node-annotations>
                </e-node>
            </e-nodes>
            <e-connectors>
                <e-connector id='connector1' sourceID='potential' targetID='industry'>
                </e-connector>
                <e-connector id='connector2' sourceID='supplier' targetID='industry'>
                </e-connector>
                <e-connector id='connector3' sourceID='substitutes' targetID='industry'>
                </e-connector>
                <e-connector id='connector4' sourceID='buyers' targetID='industry'>
                </e-connector>
                <e-connector id='connector5' sourceID='potential' targetID='buyers' [segments]='segments1' [targetDecorator]='decorator'>
                </e-connector>
                <e-connector id='connector6' sourceID='buyers' targetID='substitutes' [segments]='segments2' [targetDecorator]='decorator'>
                </e-connector>
                <e-connector id='connector7' targetID='supplier' sourceID='substitutes' [segments]='segments3' [targetDecorator]='decorator'>
                </e-connector>
                <e-connector id='connector8' sourceID='supplier' targetID='potential' [segments]='segments4' [targetDecorator]='decorator'>
                </e-connector>
            </e-connectors>
        </ejs-diagram>

    </div>
    <div class="col-lg-4 property-section">
        <div class="property-panel-header">
            Properties
        </div>
        <div id="propertypanel" class="e-remove-selection">
            <div class="property-panel-content">
                <div class="row" id="appearance">
                    <div class="row row-header">
                        Appearance
                    </div>
                    <div class="row">
                        <div class="row sb-child-row">
                            <div class="image-pattern-style" id="topLeft" style="background-image: url(./assets/diagram/Images/annotation/Annotation_1.png); margin-right: 4px">
                            </div>
                            <div class="image-pattern-style" id="topRight" style="background-image: url(./assets/diagram/Images/annotation/Annotation_2.png); margin: 0px 4px">
                            </div>
                            <div class="image-pattern-style" id="bottomLeft" style="background-image: url(./assets/diagram/Images/annotation/Annotation_3.png);margin-left: 4px">
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row sb-child-row">
                            <div class="image-pattern-style" id="bottomRight" style="background-image: url(./assets/diagram/Images/annotation/Annotation_4.png); margin-right: 4px">
                            </div>
                            <div class="image-pattern-style" id="center" style="background-image: url(./assets/diagram/Images/annotation/Annotation_5.png); margin: 0px 4px">
                            </div>
                            <div class="image-pattern-style" id="bottomCenter" style="background-image: url(./assets/diagram/Images/annotation/Annotation_6.png);margin-left: 4px">
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="row" style="padding-top: 10px">
                    <div class="row row-header">
                        Alignment
                    </div>
                    <div class="row sb-child-row">
                        <div class="col-xs-4 column-style">
                            <button ejs-button #bold (click)="btnBoldClick()" style="width:100%" iconCss="e-ddb-icons e-bold"></button>
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-xs-4 column-style">
                            <button ejs-button #italic (click)="btnItalicClick()" style="width:100%" iconCss="e-ddb-icons e-italic"></button>
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-xs-4 column-style">
                            <button ejs-button #underline (click)="btnUnderlineClick()" style="width:100%" iconCss="e-ddb-icons e-underline"></button>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="row sb-child-row">
                        <div class="col-xs-4 column-style">
                            <input ejs-colorpicker #colorpicker id="fontcolor" value='#000' type='color' (change)='onFontColorChange($event)' />
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-xs-4 column-style">
                            <ejs-numerictextbox #fontSize id="fontSize" value="12" step="2" format='##.##' (change)='onFontSizeChange($event)'>
                            </ejs-numerictextbox>
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-xs-4 column-style">
                            <ejs-dropdownlist id="fontfamily" #fontfamily [dataSource]="fontType" [fields]="fields" popupWidth='150' width='100%' placeholder='select a font type' (change)="onFontFamilyChange($event)">
                            </ejs-dropdownlist>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="row" style="padding-top: 10px">
                    <div class="row row-header">
                        Templates
                    </div>
                    <div class="row col-xs-8" style="padding-left: 0px; padding-top: 8px">
                        <ejs-dropdownlist id="template" #template [dataSource]="templateList" [fields]="templateFields" popupWidth='200' width='100%' placeholder='select a template' (change)="onLabelTemplateChange($event)">
                        </ejs-dropdownlist>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="row" style="padding-top: 10px">
                    <div class="row row-header">
                        Behaviour
                    </div>
                    <div class="row" style="padding-top: 8px">
                        <ejs-checkbox #labelConstraints id="labelConstraints" label="Label interaction" [checked]="false" (change)="onLabelInteractionChange($event)"></ejs-checkbox>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
